review_body: Services are provided/delivered but there support is very bad

name: Jon Nich
review_header: So here I am after signing up for a…server.
review_body: So here I am after signing up for a server on Saturday morning, its now late on Tuesday evening and I'm no closer to that tantalising prize. I have servers with two other companies who both managed to switch it on instantly. I used ovh because they seemed to be a better deal. Hmmmm. How wrong I was. The reason its taking so long? Their ''excellent'' fraud prevention department. So excellent that they can't set up an automated email describing the 457 documents you need to supply them with in order to convince them that you are a law abiding citizen. Just the first six and last four digits of your debit card (why not just have the lot - and the csv number as well), your nic handle next to it, your passport and a bank statement showing proof of address. I could buy yellowcake with less documentation. So I sent all of the above as soon as I received their email 48 hours after paying for the service. The result? Sorry, not good enough for them. No idea why - I followed the instructions to the letter. I've requested a full refund. I will increase the rating to a full two stars should they manage to refund me tomorrow. But I have the strangest of feelings that recovering the £270 I sent them is going to be a miserable affair. Will update when I hear more news. Update: The length of time it will take to refund my payment is beyond their control apparently. Should take 9-14 business days and up to 29 days for the paypal payment. Thanks ovh! You're the best. /s

name: Daniel Diaz
review_body: Lacks personalization and lacks support and customer interaction. No refund policy and no way to trial their servers. They wont give a refund unless its their fault. Unrecommended, stay away from this host unless you want a host with "as-is" services.

name: Sanjay
review_body: Absolute Junk of a company. This company used to be good around 1 year ago. First and foremost I have wasted so much time going back and forth trying to deal with issues with their non existent support team. They have really really bad issues facing them. Their who control panel and features are actually broken, right now. You cannot migrate a domain into OVH as their migration tool is broken. It took me 3 weeks to get a response from this and their so called suport guys having no idea about what to do or say. AVOID LIKE THE PLAUGE I have honestly had so many issues it's unbelievable.

name: James Hughes
review_body: Avoid, support non-existent. Asked for a simple tag transfer, failed. Called and was told would be fixed within couple of hours and someone will get back to me. No action, no response. Emailed asking what happened, no response. Called the next day and all the call centre will do is play message saying customer support closed and will reopen at 9am. This call was at 9:40am (I guess someone forgot to switch it off....) Now waiting another whole day for a basic tag change. Will never use them again.

name: Jeroen W
review_header: Really bad nowadays, although it was good a few years back
review_body: Really bad, it was good in the past, but current days, stay away! when it runs, it runs, nothing fancy or super fast but it runs, but when something goes wrong, good luck getting it fixed. I am moving all my sites away from them, that should say enough. 502 error and no way to get in to touch with ovh whatsoever.... (applicable for dutch branch of them)

name: MustafaD
review_body: I have been in the IT Infrastructure business for over 7 years now and never have I encountered a more unethical company, which is very surprising considering the size of their operations. I ordered a new cloud server. I wanted to attach an additional disk to it. Apparently they have set up some quota mechanism which does not let you add a disk or much additional resources without opening a support ticket. So I did. The customer advocate told me that in order to lift the quota, I would have to add USD 60 to my account. I added USD 60, not thinking much about it. After being assured that the matter would be dealt with, after four days of not upgrading the quotas, I was told to deposit another USD 400. I would never recommend this company to anyone. Stay away from this fraudulent enterprise.

name: JamesM
review_body: 4 days ago I bought a domain name for £3.20 but OVH still have not processed it. I logged in today and there is a notice saying my order is not complete because I have not submitted some documents. I was not told I had to submit ID documents to buy a domain name for £3.20. Madness! They want a copy of my bank statements and utility bill and copy of my ID and a photo of the payment card I used. If they think I'm going to send all that to someone I've never met then they are living in a dream world. It's not safe! This is also a total waste of my time. In the meantime someone else could have purchased the domain name I wanted. Avoid OVH because dealing with them is more effort than it's worth.

name: Scott C
review_header: OVH company is HORRIBLE DO NOT BUY
review_body: This company is HORRIBLE DO NOT BUY. I bought a game server from them and it was listed at $129. they said it was a OC i7700 k with 2 500g of ssd drives.and 64 g a ram. with 1000 up and downloads.. Then when i buy it it says i get it in in 120 sec. 9 hours later they tell me that it going to take 3 more days. then when i get the server..........it has no KVM and they say that its not possible to have a KVM . SO i said well how am i going install windows server if i have no KVM. Well they call me back and say i can buy a KVM for $200 a month. lol BUT i was told it came with a KVM. SO i had to buy a new windows server license from THEM . then they charged me $80 to buy a USB stick so i could upload my ISO to install windows server. THEN after i had it all installed i tested my upload and download speeds and it was 100 down and 60 upload. So i call them and they say that it must be the speed test i was doing..LOL i was using their speed test.......they they say that i only get 250 up and down WHEN there web page said 1000 up and down!! the next day they changed there website to show 250 up and down and it showed bursted..........so i call tech support and they said humm it should be 1000 up and down. THEN a manager calls me back and says they are closing my account? LOL>>>>>>>>>>> for no reason!!! Do they not get that FALSE ADVERTISING IS ILLEGAL IN THE USA?

name: Achilles Van Gestel
review_body: Theres absolutly no support, been waiting 5days for my product, still don't have it. Ive called customer service 5 times and not once they replied.

name: Oly
review_header: For all the negative reviews please read...
review_body: For all the negative reviews, most of the options OVH offers are unmanaged. Meaning they have limited to no support if you have issues, which is why it's so cheap. If you expect top quality customer service, look for a managed solution. If you have an idea on how to manage a VPS and want to save some money, they are a great option. I have used them for about 6 months with no downtime with a VPS in Canada. Their automation system works great and I have not had to contact support at all. Most of these reviews that you see complain about how long it takes to receive a response from them, again most of their options are unmanaged. TLDR; If you are able to manage a server with no help, they are good. If you are going to need help along the way, look elsewhere.

name: Natacha Ségala
review_header: Do sign up unless you choose to sign up for life
review_body: Everything was fine until... I decided to switch provider. Fearing this would be the case, I emailed their customer service to check on the transfer a couple of days after it was initiated. The answer I got was extremely unhelpful and patronising. When I checked a second time, this time the transfer had been magically initiated which the customer representative confirmed without further details about timeline or apologies about their previous reply. Result: my website is down. I have emailed them again. It's a joke and a bad one too. The most ironic thing is that I kept getting automated emails reminding me to make sure to renew the services! I wish OVH were as keen to enable the transfer and update the client accordingly instead of needlessly spamming about renewing.

name: Jim Wilkinson
review_body: I bought the service and transferred my files there. The system had a problem and some files were not uploaded (normal html files with little sice, nothing special). The support told me that there was nothing they could do to fix it, but they refused giving me the money back, even if the service was not working and I claimed the day after I bought it. Avoid this hosting!

review_body: I ordered a dedicated server from Soyoustart before 6 days and paid. I am still waiting to get it! They said that Server is out of stock and i need to wait. How is it possible to order it if it is out of stock? And I see it is still available on their webpage!!!

name: Laurent
review_header: Awful customer service (dead silent) + Unreliable infrastructure = OVH
review_body: I have been a user of OVH for many years now using them for hosting small websites. Until now I have never had any issues. Recently one of my websites became suddenly unreachable. I raised the issue with OVH. They promised to come back to me with a fix within 30min/1h. Amazing I thought although I already doubted they would solve it so quickly. 5 hours later no news. I gave them a call. No answer. Phone line is dead. Tried again a couple of hours and I managed to talk to someone promising an answer within 24 hours.... I spare you the next details: a couple of days later I have never managed to talk to someone, sent many emails, never heard anything from them. And my website is still down. I accept technical issues may sometimes arise. I can also accept that it might be difficult to fix them technically. However keeping your customer uninformed and making false promises are unacceptable. OVH are unreliable, utterly useless and do not care about customer service! Avoid. A soon-to-be former OVH customer for more than 10 years

review_body: 24 hours after payment and there is still no VPS provided to me. I do not recommend this service. They do not create VPS instantly while we're all living in 21st century.

review_body: Quality service, really supported me within the process of saving my community with the dedicated server issues I experienced. Been with them for 2 years or so, and will not stop. Incredible service.

They have a 'lip service' approach to copyright theft, listing an abuse contact, but OVH neither respond to, nor act upon copyright notices. They are gradually putting all things artistic and legal out of business, with their support of the criminal slave master. Anyone who works within a legal frame work should stay away from them.

name: Jonas Madsen
review_body: I made a 1-star review, but trust me... They are better now. So when I started I thought I got scammed as I said in my last review, but they had a thing that does if I pay 2 times for the same product it will just extend the next due date... Didn't know about that. But I recommend using the Public Cloud as it is a lot more easy to use. If you just buy a VPS its no good idea, as they have a terrible control panel for VPS if you want to change your Additional Disk. But all in all pretty nice and cheap.

name: Vitali
review_header: I have ordered a new VPS and domain …
review_body: I have ordered a new VPS and domain from OVH. As I started to configure the domain, I have noticed frequently occurred failures on their customer interface. I got white pages as response or error messages instead of the page content. The rest of the time the interface has worked I also faced A LOT of bugs! But the worst part is, they really seem to scam the customers. Best example: I have created a new MX DNS record (for email) for my domain in their customer interface. This is a free service. After that I have noticed in the services tab a new paid service called “MX Plan”. But, I have NEVER gave them my permission to set up this service! The other reviews on this site are absolutely correct. OVH is a really bad choice if you want to get a reliable, transparent hosting provider.

You can upload them and access them through HTTP, but you can't view them in FTP. "We have a 5000 file limit" is their reply. You can't upload SQL files larger than 1 Mb through PHPMyAdmin.504 Gateway Time-outs everywhere. It's utter crap.

name: Liza Zadorina
review_header: They fixed their mistake in the end
review_body: UPDATE: After i made a review here and walked through a ticket (week long), they agreed that there's no reason to charge me for the services we were not using anymore and made a refund. But it really took me a lot of time and effort to get this confirmation. Hopefully they'll improve their customer support in Future. This hosting is weird. The services itself are okay, but when it goes to a customer support.... You'd better run from there as fast as possible. What happened to us: 1) We've purchased a dedicated server from them it was working kinda okay for a half of the year and then they started to make a Hard Reboot of our machine each month. On my questions WHY they said there are some difficulties with the hard ware and they're rebooting the server due to it. This causes us at least 2-3 hours of non working site and for a growth online business is crucial. After they didn't want to do anything about this situation and poorly responded onto tickets once per 3 days, we decided to handle the situation on our own and switch to a new machine hopefully without a bug. 2) So we did it, we've purchased a way more expansive dedicated server and canceled our old server on a due date cause we just finished the configurations. You know what? They charged us for the whole next month of using the old server even we're not having it in our possession anymore. I opened a ticket asking "What's wrong with the billing" and they simply answered (within 4 days): it was a due date so you've been charged for a month of usage!!! They literally charged us for the server which i can't even reach anymore it's not in our control panel or anywhere else and probably already belongs to another customer with all it's hardware errors. Would highly recommend to consider another provider.

review_header: Very very very bad hosting service

review_header: Terrible service. Site unavailable. Servers down non-stop.
review_body: Do not use it. It is the worst hosting service ever.

name: Alex S
review_body: I've tryed to order and to install an instance of Public Cloud, and have been dissapointed completely: I have not used they hosting at all (it was something completely virtual - nor root or SSH access, nor FTP access) and have asked for refund on the next day. From my point of view, the hosting panel should be marked as a "Beta" (it's very laggy and has poor usability). And most important: they DO NOT offer a refund for a credit! Just want to cite the email: "Hello, All sales for our Public Cloud credits are final, as stated in our user agreement. Because you are prepaying these services, and because this is a rental service, we cannot offer refunds as my colleague mentioned. We thank you for your understanding in this matter. For any other questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us through a support ticket or through our toll-free line at 1-855-684-5463. We’re here 24/7 to help you! We thank you again for choosing OVH, Taylor Customer Advocate Make sure to visit our FAQ --- P.S: I'm not a novice and rented different VPS servers for years without such problems.

name: Thunder Wave
review_body: No problems at all. Have had 2 dedi servers, a vps, and multiple domains. Everything works perfectly.

name: Ben
review_body: I have been using service from SoYouStart which is an OVH subsidiary for over 1 year and have not had not issues with the service so far. The network is far better than other hosting providers I have used in the past and includes plenty of things such as DDOS protection FREE of charge (other providers sometimes charge). There pricing is fair and there customer service is second to none for a hosting provider. I would like to thank Thomas Wales and the UK team for ongoing support and all of the support guys in Canada for the services which I have deployed through the US control panel. Thanks.

name: Gary Burman
review_body: I signed up for a server on the 16th of the month, paying approximately £76. Around the 28th of the month I get another bill for £38. They didn't explain what this bill was for. They like to bill you for server time you didn't ask for. "pro rata". Shoddy.

review_header: a few years and no issues

review_body: VPS completely OK - plesk is what it is, but worked ok, pretty impressively fast really. What I couldn't stomach was OVH deciding the me surfing my control panel must mean I'd want £25 of hosting credit charged to my account - not once but twice in one month. I had no default payment method set, otherwise they'd have just helped themselves. Customer service slow to respond and couldn't answer why it happened first time, so second time and I just closed my account. So I can only join in with chorus of disapproving reviews for customer service....

Whenever they send and report I have removed/terminate the accounts from the server. I have requested to give only 10 minutes to remove the abuse content but NO REPLY. Even I asked to mount 2nd hard where I have stored the backups but same NO REPLY. I called them but the support stuff said they they have no authority to check this only abuse team can handle and they will reply when they available, almost 20 hours and there are no single reply, I have more then 1000 cpanel accounts and there are no hope to get back the backup. review_body: I can't create my second IP for my new server, because there is an error on the control panel (code related). I have opened a ticket more than 5 hours ago, with no answer. I'm about to be sorry I left Server4You (that has it's own problems). If you like fast response, maybe OVH is not for you.

name: rev com
review_body: If your domain and hosting is close to expire time they do not answer any emails (if you want to transfer domain) to force you to extend the time of buying the service with them..

name: Joe
review_body: I haven't had a problem with them everything is running smoothly, it's easy to fully control the services they offer. No downtime, fast server. Great availability of services. You shouldn't use them if you're not competent at managing everything yourself and not expecting them to manage and troubleshoot problems with you regarding your server setup. This is clearly stated in the contract you sign when ordering a service. Everyone complaining about them wanting identification to activate your account, this will be to prevent fraud so it's understandable and can't be an automated system realistically. I agree they should make it a bit more clear that if you are a new customer you need a validated account before your order will be processed.

name: Ole Christensen
review_body: Nope, same os the others. No support at all. Tried contact multiple times - even via twitter - no response.

name: Danny Clowes
review_body: If you want honest about OVH i've been with them for many years. I finally stopped hosting with OVH as someone gained access to the OVH manager, and OVH Support Ticket Request was opened and still hasn't been answered today. I've left there services found another provide. They don't care that someone able to access our control panel clear all the data off the servers by pressing the reimage button. They haven't commented to their ticket that open reason they are ashamed. they know someone accessed the control panel without me knowing and when we called them up they didn't care part from just secure the account. did that said give us call back after you done that we take the next step they didn't they just said now have access to your account again you can get everything back online, i thought about it and i thought now i'm just another number too them so i left their services. GOOD BYE hope you look at my feedback will not use OVH never again after was there fault my account was hacked as it was locked out by IP system but wasn't working that day..

name: Ethan Smith
review_header: No issues, they've improved, better 24/7 support, overall positive experience.
review_body: I've been a customer with OVH for 2 years now, their support has improved a lot, all my VPS(s) and dedicated servers with them were promptly delivered and I've been overall very pleased with their 24/7 support and phone number (United States and Canada) and how amazingly priced their offers and services are. They have amazing Anti-DDoS mitigation which keeps your VPSs or Servers online during attacks, a strong network that is continuously improving, helpful documentation and so much more. I've used all 3 of their services, ovh.com, kimsufi.com, and SoYouStart and OVH.com has the best control panel, you can easily enable backup options, firewall settings, reverse DNS, reinstall your OS from a very large selection of operating systems, and more. I can definitely recommend OVH, if you are a new customer they may do a validation/fraud check on your info to verify that you're a legitimate person, but after that you're good to go. They didn't require it for me as all my info matched up.

name: Danny Kilgallon
review_header: Best Server Company In The World
review_body: I have been a customer of OVH/SoYouStart for almost 6 years now. I was absolutely amazed to see the bad reviews on here as i have had nothing but excellent support and services from them from day one. Over the years i have spoke to the support team on a regular basis and i have got to know a few of them on a first name basis and sort of built a relationship with them. I have never spoke to them and not got to the end result. On numerous occasions they have gone above and beyond to help me resolve issues that i have had. My whole organisation relies on OVH and i wouldn't want it hosted anywhere else. I think the problem is that OVH/SoYouStart is for the more advanced server admins that actually know what they are doing with regards to installing their own operating systems, networks, backups etc. Over the years OVH have made some really great improvements to their backend user control panels to make it as easy as possible for users to perform tasks such as installing new operating systems at the click of a button. At first the networking of servers can be tricky, however they have a comprehensive set of guides that should be self explanatory to any competent admin. And like with anything once you become aware of how to configure it correctly you will have no issues going forward as it is the same for all the servers. Over the 6 years i have had about 10 dedicated servers and a number of VPS servers. I have only ever had one server that has gone down on me and that was due to a faulty nic that was replaced within the hour. Apart from that i have had no downtime with OVH. I would highly recommend OVH/SoYouStart to anyone needing a server that has a good knowledge of being a server admin. The prices are exceptional and unrivalled to be honest. The comments about the non existent support is simply not true i don't think i have ever had to wait more than 5 minutes on the phone to speak to anyone before. Even out of hours support is great with the guys in France and also Australia. Overall OVH is a top quality server hosting company and i cannot recommend them highly enough. I will continue to use their services and products for as long as i run my own organisations. Thank you OVH Danny

name: Lau YS
review_body: They never bothered replying to my support tickets regarding my domain name. Have instructed them to transfer my website from an old hosting company when I purchased the hosting service from them. They haven't transferred the domain name since then and they are ignoring my tickets!

review_header: Dreadful experience and I only signed up yesterday!
review_body: Yesterday I had the misfortune of signing up to these idiots before I'd read the other reviews! So far they've billed me twice, the support ticket I raised 14 hours ago is still unopened, I tried phoning them but the phone just rings and I've tried emailing them... again ignored. They still haven't set up the VPS I ordered. NOT HAPPY! I one had the misfortune of dealing with a (for a client) budget Chinese hosting company... they were 10 times better than this lot and they couldn't even speak English! Will be contacting my card company later for a charge back. I've also made sure I've taken a screen shot of my support tickets as they'll most likely be deleted. *UPDATE* 48 hours after signing up I've had NO response from OVH and the VPS I ordered is still not setup!

name: Lambros
review_body: We have support ticket (5110552003) regarding network quality for two weeks. There is 0 progress. The only one answer is " We waiting a reply from engineer, there is nothing what we can do more". Wait how long. Month.will cancel 10 dedicated servers. If you want to complain to the manager, you have to write to the general support email. How dump is that? Stay away.

name: Artur
review_body: Almost non existent support, days to answer tickets and they still get it wrong. They won't admit they have a problem even their MAP shows there's an issue. Failing FTP backup, failing snapshots, missing RAM and late delivery of extra services paid for. Run people!

name: neb
review_body: Been with OVH for 5 years, not had one problem to this date. Owned 18 VPS's and 44 Dedicated Servers with them. I see lots of people complain about OVH, I can't see why they do. I admit their support is pretty poor for a large company but their servers are rock solid. Basically, if you know what you are doing with servers in general and have good knowledge then you should definitely not have a problem with them. I have not hosted a domain with them or used their web hosting, I am reviewing on their VPS and Dedicated servers. Their servers perform extremely well with excellent uptime, have not had any of my servers go offline unexpectedly. In conclusion, OVH is a rock solid company which I definitely recommend for experienced users.

name: Aidan VerbBusters
review_body: Customer service made no attempt either to investigate or resolve my issue fending me off with a couple of useless canned replies and then just ignoring further requests.

name: yiran liu
review_body: Most terrible experience I've ever had I called to open a VPS, firstly they said "it is guaranteed to open in next 2 hours" Then they ask to provide id to verify, I provided and called them they said they can verify today but won't be able to open VPS for me today, and when I ask for a timeline, they hang up my phone. After I called back they said it will be ready tmr (Saturday), and don't worry if I call on Sat they will have a team in Canada on shift to cover my request. And I just need to call them on same number the day after when I call same number their line are closed!

name: Andy
review_body: OVH are by far the worst hosting company we have ever used, vps constantly fails, can't even reboot from control panel, no customer service on weekends but when the are there they are useless and uninterested, use any company but OVH

name: Konstantin Schlegel
review_body: Every 2. day the Server just randomly disconnects. When I ask the support it's always a maintenance that wasn't on the Info Page when the Problem occoured. The DDos Protection is blocking legit ip's (even for a longer time), slow support reaction. Not recommended. Edit: Still hosting there because I have no other choice. I contacted the Support because someone was able to bypass their DDOS Protection. I gave them the Info (such as time of down-time) and their response (after about a week or two) was "No that didn't happen" and that's it.

name: Tom
review_header: Awesome if you know what you're doing
review_body: I see a lot of people ripping on OVH and I really can't understand why - getting and keeping a linux server up and running is an active and involved task! Many people I suspect simply look at the price with no regard in how much it costs to run this equipment. To offer the services they do for this pricing, I don't think anybody can complain. I have had one or two very minor problems in the 3 plus years I have been using OVH but every time it has been something minor (and usually something initially caused by myself). I have just started to host some commercial sites using one of my VPS servers and have had no problems at all with them. If you're just looking for a simple server or don't have a great deal of experience with this, look elsewhere but if you want a fully packed VPS that you manage completely, OVH is brilliant.

name: Jamie
review_body: I tested a couple of OVH cloud instances over a couple of weeks. They were ok in terms of performance, but not as good as the specs suggested. HOWEVER, I was charged for two full months' use as my test period crossed over the end/beginning of a calendar month. I pointed out that charging me eight weeks' use for two weeks was not 'pro rata' (as they promise) or proportionate or fair. They didn't care and have taken my money by credit card. Don't use them if you have any fears of being over-billed.

name: S Tapp
review_body: One of the worst if not the wordt hosting company i have had the mis-fortune to use. We have received your payment related to the order number received by paypal and we would like to thank you for choosing OVH services. For your security, we would like to check the information that you have provided especially the identity of the billing contact. Therefore, we would be grateful if you could send us the following documents as soon as possible in order to validate your order: For a business account: - a proof of address such as bank statement, utility bill dated in the last 3 months showing the company name - a copy of ID (passport, driving licence, birth certificate) ITS WEB HOSTING NOT A LOAN OR CAR PURCHASE GET A GRIP...

name: Mike Dawson
review_body: I only dealt with OVH when buying a domain for a friend, but it worked extremely well unlike a few mainstream registrars I've dealt with in the past! Would highly recommend this company based on past experience with them, and the hassle-free service.

name: Brendan Rosa
review_body: Now, I can surely speak for this company when it comes to downtime. Our infrastructure with OVH consists of 1 master and 570 slaves (at the time of writing this). Yep, that's right. We have a total of 571 VPS SSD 1s with them. That amounts to just shy of $2,000 in monthly costs. Okay, enough of how much we're paying them and on with their quality of service. For some time now (we've been customers on and off for just about 2 years now). At the time of writing this, I'm infuriated with this issue which has persisted since we've been with them from day one. Why we use them? The low price. Is it worth it? Absolutely not. You really get what you pay for. The issue you ask? VPSs always go down all the time, having to KVM into each of the affected ones and restart the network interfaces. Sounds tedious right? Yep, especially when it cuts into precious development time where it can take 1-4 hours to fix all the VPSs just for that day. Now, this isn't about how long it takes. It's about the down time. They will most likely not refund you for downtime as they claim on their end your VPSs are "online", which they're NOT. I've even emailed them with screenshots on how I go about fixing the issue to potentially help squash this issue once and for all. Their care for customers is nonexistent. Again, this issue has persisted with them for years. We've informed them of the issue countless times throughout, and they seem to refuse to fix something that would keep us customers for life. Oh, and when they know it's on them, they ignore any tickets you send them. Like no response. Zero. Nada. As a customer for 2 years, I can confidently tell you they are a shady company. I would try an alternative provider Digital Ocean, Amazon (a bit expensive), NOCIX, etc. Just search around - just don't go with 1&1, trust me, we're 1&Done. They're just as shady if not worse. I've had enough with OfflineVH.

name: medhacloud
review_header: OVH - The Worst company I've ever worked with! don't be fooled by their price
review_body: We are a startup Our company reputation and money ruined by OVH .Please read the story below. Hello All, This is the worst company I've ever worked with! don't be fooled by their price, they are not worth a penny! I have Two dedicated server with them.In my dedicated servers there were some VPS and they were compromised for some time. We tried to understand what was going on and decided to hire a Security company in the US to fix the issue. They did fixed it and told us the VPS was hacked. 2 days later OVH Terminated out server and not even responding what the are steps to additionally to be taken to get services recovered. Even i tried reaching company CEO through LinkedIn ( As he is my network ) Anyway so their customer support decided to block all the access.we couldn't do anything anymore. When you have their support team on the phone it gets even worst, the only thing they are willing to do is referring you to their ''online manual'' .While they are actually capable of fixing the issue they just made, instead they asked us to go through long and complicated processes to retrive files from the ftp (files which after 5 calls to them, apparently never existed!). After being missed informed so many times we tried to talk to a supervisor, they wouldn't even let you! (I've never seen such a bad customer service in my entire career!) Here is a good tip: NEVER deal with that company EVER! and dont trust CEO ,I have no clue how he becaome a CEO I requested every one including CEO OVH to forward this message to the people in your network so they will have a peace of mind in life. Regards Medhacloud

name: SG
review_header: Great value, stable servers but bad support
review_body: Stable servers, not very expensive. Support is horrible, wont respond or takes weeks to respond. Calling makes no sense, they just say i'll have to wait for response on my ticket. At the end it will be solved, but it takes a long time. Firewall also sucks, when u host a gameserver with about ~200 players on different IP's, Mitigation will automatically switch on, wich makes connecting almost impossible. No support to fix this, they are ignoring my issue for already 4 weeks.

name: DanaWKIle
review_header: If something goes wrong you are DOOMED
review_body: I have been with OVH for about 8 years. Everything was fine in the beginning but in the past year the support has become incredibly low quality. If something outside your control goes wrong you are basically left alone to solve the issue. When they reply to your support request (usually after days after the ticket has been open) all they do is link to their guides online, without making an actual effort to help you. Terrible experience and I will be switching soon all my websites to another hosting provider.

name: Ben St. Pierre
review_header: They shut down my server for no reason
review_body: They told me my server was attacking 1.1.1.1 with UDP floods. They shut down my server and gave no refund. Asked me to pay for a new one. I had to reverse changed with my bank to get my money back. This is possibly the worst customer service I have ever had.

name: Pedro
review_header: Do not use OVH web hosting services
review_body: They have to much cons on their web-hosting services... It's not worth the money you pay! There are company's offering so much better for so much less!

name: pixwebmaster
review_header: OVH is the news with our MONEY CROOKS SCAMMERS THIEVES
review_body: OVH is the news and we make them big while they rip us off..we must all complain at CEO L Allard online FB / tweet / linkedin..find him and send this opinion you posted here.. i do it now.. so come on together we can get some attention single request are ignored ! OVH SAS = CROOKS SCAMMERS THIEVES

name: Christopher Taylor
review_body: I've found support decent. Run many dedicated servers with them. I've had issues in the past with error 404 after payment, and then ordering another server. All in all they're good.

name: christian
review_header: Know what you actually want and its good to go
review_body: Alot of those 1 star reviews are just people crying about the customer support. Yes the customer support is bad but their product range is huge and you can get some very powerfull machines for an solid price. If you know what exactly you want you should go with ovh/ soyoustart. As long as you can handle things yourself without needing the support for some dumb questions its a very great experience. The ddos protection is amazingly good and the specs of the machines can be very powerfull that alot other companies never will have enough resources to provide their customers with.

name: Silvestro
review_header: Lost time, data, work and money!
review_body: Choosing OVH was a big mistake, do not be attracted by good prices. Their Technical and Customer Assistance are very bad. I've purchased a cloud server service for one month, I could use it for just a week: the server almost empty and without pubblic domain, with active firewall and fail2ban, was attacked, for 1 minute or 60 seconds, and OVH unilaterally terminated the contract. Lost time, data, work and money.

name: fkjq
review_header: Was happy until I saw OVH lost up to 80% of the email my client sent through the website
review_body: I can’t believe they did that. I have lost many many emails, I will never know the number. Some of my clients complained they could not reach me, I thought it was my mistake. But after a year of these complaints (most of the client just gave up and did not report it), I ran some automatic test to see if OVH was responsible. It regularly lost up to 80% of the email (they were not stuck in the spam, they simply never arrived). And those who were not deleted arrived 24 hours later (they were sent on a Sunday…). And it was not all: the redirection OVH was supposed to do did not even work. One email Stokes as a redirection lost even more email… OVH never responded to that, like nothing happened. By using this company you will never be sure to receive your email, and if something get wrong with them, they don’t care (it’s a French company…)

name: Gary
review_body: When I read some of the reviews I figured it was just their competition trying to make them look bad, OVH use to have a good reputation, well that has all ended they are worst than Virpus which should tell you how truly bad OVH has become. I purchased a VPS and POOF nothing, they took the money and didn't give me anything, support ticket has gone unanswered. If you're like me thinking the reviews are false, STOP right now they are real, OVH is just horrible.

name: Alasdair
review_header: Took 5 days until I asked for a refund
review_body: I purchased a reasonably expensive VPS service and the issues started there. I didn't receive the emails I was supposed to, even ringing the support number twice (It says there is a queue then hangs you up) and also interacting with people from Twitter who all said the same thing. I asked for a refund 5 days later because I still hadn't had access to my VPS, or my account for that matter. Unbelievable.

name: Jonas Esbo
review_body: Wanted to setup a simple VPS and OVH offered a turn key solution at a seemingly good price. Thought this would be a walk in the park and that I could start uploading my website right away - But such luck. I had no access to the VPS and only some 20 hours later I received an email and I had to confirm the order by logging in with a U/P. But the password for the handle didnt work. Then later I get an email from support asking me to provide ID documentation and prof of address. I lost my patience with them at this point and emailed back and asked them to cancel my order and refund the purchase. I hear nothing back for 24 hours. Then I receive yet another email asking for ID documentation and also company registration documents. I email back and ask them to cancel my order once again. No reply. And in the midst of it, they even have the audacity to email me a customer satisfaction questionnaire. Which I was happy to fill out of cause :) Fortunately my purchase was only of some 20€, cause Im not expecting to get my money back.

name: Chris
review_body: I ordered 6 VPS's on Friday morning, the order said that it would be fulfilled instantly and that I'd have my VPS's instantly. However they had to verify my payment. So I sent all required documents and it's now Sunday and they haven't got back to me once to tell me anything. I don't know if the documents have been accepeted, if the money's been taken. Nothing. AVOID THIS COMPANY. Pay a little extra and go somewhere with real customer support.

name: Charlie Ford
review_body: I had a VPS Server with OVH and was thinking of moving all of my other servers to them but im glad i decided not to now. The VPS was working fine then suddenly i was unable to access it. I phoned OVH and they had a look and then told me there is nothing wrong with it. Phone call after phone call they finally decided to pass it over to their technicians who aparantly had a look and also said there are no issues. I dont understand how there were no issues when it was inaccessible! The support reps i spoke with didn't seem to care about anything, I said i am going to request compensation and my money back and also will be putting in complaints but they couldn't care less. AVOID AVOID AVOID like the plague - 100% CRAP!

name: Makis
review_header: Stay away - Don't make the same mistake I did and trust their services
review_body: If only I could read all these reviews before subscribing to their service. I have created ticket 20 days ago for not being able to backup my Public Cloud instance. They replied 8 days after I created that ticket asking me to try backing up the server once more. So I did. Result was to have the server offline and not reachable from their web panel. I updated the ticket right away and called them too. Their told that will forward this to their "technicians". Server has been offline now for one week and no matter how many time I called them they always tell me either to open a ticket(which I did weeks ago and they never replied) or that they'll forward this incident to the technicians. They don't offer any support, period.

name: Alvaro
review_body: The customer service in UK does not exist. I have tried to contact them in relation to the SSL service that is offered in their page and: 1. They did not know that they are offering such service 2. I am waiting over a week now just to have a reply from them. Impossible let your business in this their hand.

name: Kevin Bajzek
review_body: Where do I begin. Not even a month in and I am fed up with OVH's service. When I buy additional IP addresses for my dedicated server, they are nonexistent and do not work as intended. Eventually my dedicated server stops unexpectedly, and I get an email from support saying its a "malfunction" on their end with the machine. A day later, I get an email saying that I am basically on my own, they boot the server in rescue mode and tell me to figure out how to repair my own server. Plus, the links they provide to help me fix it, I either don't have access or I get a 404 error saying the links don't exist. Steer clear from this host, support is absolutely horrendous, the servers are unreliable, and as soon as something goes wrong, you are up a creek without a paddle.

name: Len Holdsdtock
review_header: WEB SITE DOWN AND NO SUPPPORT Stay clear of OVH
review_body: Hi everyone, My website hosted by OVH was down on Friday 5 feb. 2016, 1 hour on hold then they say the problem is on their side and that they are working on it. Friday evening still luck. I phoned their 1007 help line and got Canada, I live in France. The Canadian help desk cant help web hosting in France. name: Colin B
review_body: Provide a time estimate for a server. Miss that estimate by a working week. Refuse to give a refund. Horrible customer service. Avoid.

name: Rasmus
review_header: Does not honor their own SLA on Public cloud
review_body: Made a support ticket 2 months ago, due to 2 breakdowns a week apart for 2,5 hours each. Both are eligible for refund in their SLA, but they haven't even answered the support ticket. Worst company ever.

name: Gnoli
review_body: It's real bad..

name: Mark H
review_header: Took money and refused to set up VPS
review_body: I saw the cheap VPS SSD 1 package and thought it would be perfect for a quick test server - a friend even recommended them. Boy, was I wrong! It said that card payment results in immediate server setup, so I went with that option. My card payment went through... then nothing. I had to wait 30 minutes or so before I got an e-mail saying my order had been created and I can make payment by clicking a link. This rang alarm bells - they'd already taken payment! Upon clicking the link, I got a copy of my order. At the bottom, a spinning icon suggested that payment details would have to be processed manually. It would seem the e-mail received was just worded poorly - something they should address. However, this morning I get an e-mail stating they received my payment but want to verify the bill payment address (same as the account address) and need me to send copies of my passport or driver's licence! I told them there was no way I would be supplying personal documentation via an insecure method such as e-mail, plus I have no idea what they will do with my identity. I provided them a .com domain I've owned since 2001 - a WHOIS will verify that the details match those I provided and always have. Since 2013, ICANN have required domain contact details be verified - an mine have been. The reply merely restated that they need photographic ID. There is absolutely no reason for them to require photographic ID, as I am not there in person to make the order. So I called them. The agent was very pleasant and understanding, but stood firm on company policy. He stated that there is a lot of card fraud and it is unlikely that anyone would steal a card and ID at the same time. Absolute rubbish! Many people carry their driver's licence in their wallet (I can attest to this having worked in a place that required photo ID - many people took out their wallets) and, if you're on holiday, your passport is likely to be near your wallet, too. As they would not budge, I cancelled my order - which they were happy to do, and hope to receive a refund soon. During the sign-up process, I did not see anything that mentioned the possibility of requiring photo ID and my friend, who has been a customer for years, has never been asked to provide any. Their T&C make no mention of the possibility of photo ID being required, either. Both their website and T&C are full of spelling mistakes, which looks quite unprofessional.

name: Beny
review_body: Tried a couple of hosting companies and without a shadow of doubt, this is the worst ever. Do not be mislead by their cheap prices, they are the worse ever... Seriously! I sent them a complain because the ip they provided me with was unreachable, and now it is the second day I am waiting for an answer.. I lost my customers and my trafic as a result... WATCH OUT.

name: Gerard Schellen
review_header: Worst Customer Support I've EVER SEEN
review_body: OVH has the WORST customer support I've EVER EXPERIENCED in my life. I was trying to maintain my website's and I needed access to the CDN panel, but it seemed to be heavily bugged, this bug occured for every CDN user. So I call the "Incident line", and it appears to be a french women who can't speak even speak English properly at all, sounding like the phone is 4 meters away from her and she doesn't help out at all, all she does is saying I have to open a ticket and she'll redirect me to a technician, also she says there's no technician available right now. C'mon, "Incident Line" and you tell me there's no technician available? You even let me open a ticket? I CALLED to prevent opening a ticket, because you NEVER answer these tickets. You don't even reply to a ticket I opened 6 months ago, it's still open and nobody replied on it. You guys are the worst when it comes to customer service. Your whole website is as bugged as possible, this is far away from professional.

name: Anders Stark
review_body: Not sure why people are so unhappy with OVH. I signed up for their cheapest VPS plan (which by the way costs less than half a latte each month). 10 GB HDD, 1 GB RAM and 10 TB monthly transfer is included, which is totally awesome for the price. The VPS has been running a couple of months now and so far I've had no problems, I do use quite a bit of bandwidth and CPU. Sure, the OVH website is a bit unstructured and the admin panel is pretty bad, but once it's up then you can just forget about it.

name: Toader Mihali
review_body: not a problem at all till now , I have a vps , with linux , perfect till now :) Thanks !

name: N
review_header: Avoid at all cost for VPS
review_body: I got a VPS and immediately I kept losing connection to the server. Despite raising this within days of the server being provisioned they have refused to give me a refund. I proved that my server only had 90% availability and they still refused. Apparently VPS's don't fall within Distance Selling or indeed any regulations. Avoid OVH at all cost and instead go with a company that offers money back guarantee's. They are a cowboy operation! I will be reporting my experience to Trading Standards and claiming the money back from my credit card company.

name: Mark
review_header: the worst in the world for customer support
review_body: I have a VPC (Virtual Private Cloud) with them, paying around 900 eur/month, so it's supposed I should have a very good service and support. Also, I paid for the "VIP Support" that should grant you a "priority" response. Wonderful... now, how the things really works in real life ? Simple ... I submit a ticket, and nobody replies... I submit an "incident" ticket, and nobody replies too. Today for example I have three opened tickets, waiting since 8 days now, still with no response at all. If you look at their support page (from ovh homepage go to support and then to "VIP Support") you should know that: - The "level 1 incident telephone 24/7" ... does not exists !! When you buy the VIP support, they barely know which number to give you. If you insist with them, they end giving you a disconnected phone line (!!!!!). The only "phone" support they give you, even for VIP, is a "ticket submitter service" by means that there's a stranger operator who gently asks you what you want him to write in your ticket... and the trip starts from the beginning !! - The "urgent intervention start <15 minutes" and "administrator contacts me by mail/telephone" DOES NOT EXISTS: they removed that service !!! However, they still show it to attract more customers. Now, this is what to expect from OVH: NO SUPPORT AT ALL. If you're lucky, maybe the servers will go running for years and you'll have no problem at all. But pray not to ever need a support even for just 1 minute in your life of any kind from them: in case something does not work... it's just your problem !!. === update of 01 June 2016 === Things seems not to be changed at all since I wrote this review. The support is still far away from being just "acceptable". For a "real example" please read on: I had a problem two days ago with a host of my dedicated cloud. So I asked a replacement. My message to PRIORITY SUPPORT was like this one: "I am having problems with host IP x.x.x.x.x - I moved it out from the cloud. I migrated all the VM's to other hosts. Could you please replace it ?" Answer from OVH: "Please provide us with the IP of the host you want to replace". So ... either OVH is not paying glasses to their employees, or they have some mental problems of understanding a very simple message. By the way, my answer was: "The host I'm having problems with is host with IP x.x.x.x - I'm waiting for the replacement". Now the ticket is there now from TWO DAYS. No answer. Maybe the guy at the support has some problem finding the mouse button in order to do a CLICK and allocate me a new host ? Now, THIS IS the kind of support you need to expect from OVH. You are a company, you expect to buy a professional service AND a professional support. ?? No !! You just obtain a good infrastructure BUT with the worst support EVER exeperienced in your life. Customers are the very last priorities for them and are totally WORTHLESS for them. I pray EVERY DAY that the servers are still there up & running and haven't been deleted by mistake or similar. I really don't understand WHY they don't take some action to correct this lack. It's a real mistery.

name: iltizio
review_body: There are some bad experience with ovh: Some month ago I bought a dedicated server on So You Start (OVH) with xenserver. I work for a lot of month with them, but the last day, only a few days after paying the month, the OVH system detects a small ddos attack (1 mbps) start from my server, probably from a windows VM, and OVH block immediatly the server. I tried to explain that no one caused the attack and the VM was new and with antivirus. Nothing. I lost the money for the new month, for the IP of failover and also the work of these months that means that I have basically wasted money also in previous months. Other thing: the last month, always with the same server, I received a ddos attack from outside and xenserver has rebooted. And the super ddos protection? The OVH system merely send me an email saying that there was an attack ddos and that has been blocked. I asked from ticket why the ddos protection has not done its job and my server is however restarted forcing shutdown of the VM. The support team asked me to send an email to an internal group, but I never received an answer. Well presented with good products at low cost and many services, but they are criminals. Once you have paid do not care about you and try to steal more money.

name: James
review_body: I bought an £11 a month VPS from them. After multiple attempts I couldn't even login to the VPS. It wasn't setup properly. After asking for a refund the customer support guy just kept trying to get me to test the VPS and try and connect. I complied but still asked for a refund and eventually he "requested the refund to my debit card" (still waiting for refund). This is a stupid company clearly run by people who don't understand their own market and the tools required to do the job. Why should I be testing something that you're running? Surely they have technicians to do that thing... Pathetic.

name: Lucas Vincent
review_body: I recently purchased a Plesk license in addition to my existing WHM/cpanel license I already had on my VPS. When I did not receive login details within 24h of payment I filed a customer support ticket, asking how I could access my license. When they did not respond after another day I filed a second (identical) ticket. When I did not get an answer for that one either, I contacted them by regular email. This time they responded, but told me that I should use the ticket filing function for "security" purposes. When I answered by email that I had already done so twice and did not get any reply, they stopped replying my emails, too. I am now left with a license I cannot use. Thank you.

name: Maximiliano Schtroumpftech Pena-Roig
review_body: Asked me to disable the firewall for testing purpose. Get hacked in the meanwhile since no Firewall. Accuse ME of not protecting my VPS.

name: Adam Smith-Miller
review_body: I currently have 3 servers with them, 2 Dedicated and one VPS and have not had any problems with them. The support may not be the best but what do you expect from a from a french company.

name: David
review_body: I have been using a OVH VPS for a while now, and am genuinely confused at why people have been giving them 1 star reviews. Their servers are very inexpensive, good value and their support so far has been fine. I needed to reinstall my VPS at one point, and with one click and a few minutes later, it was all reinstalled. Would certainly recommend. Edit: Just ordered my second VPS because I am so impressed with the first!

name: goldexpert
review_body: I purchased this vps and before I placed this order I called their support staff. Support staff did not tell that I unable to connect VPS classic via Remote desktop, I unable to use this and I asked refund and they refused this. Beaware this SCAM Company

name: Philip Walsh
review_header: Refused to provide refund when service was not instantly setup
review_body: I placed an order with OVH at 21.09 on April 10th 2015, the order was for a VPS at £2.03 per month. Payment was taken instantly using my Mastercard and I was presented with a message that said my order was on hold pending security checks. I called the 24 hour number for OVH and was told that the order would not be processed until Monday morning and that I would have to wait until then. I asked the OVH representative to cancel the order as I need the server now and not on Monday morning and he said he was not able to do that and that I should call back Monday. I emailed customer services after getting off the phone stating clearly that if they could not have the server up and running within 24 hours then it was of no use to me and that they should cancel the order. On Monday morning I received email notification stating that my order had been processed, 2 hours later I received an email from OVH stating that they don’t do refunds as per company policy. Having sent a number of emails to OVH about this issue they insist that I am not protected by consumer rights laws and that I should just use the VPS. They consistently refuse to cancel this order despite the fact that they did not set the VPS up upon payment from me and despite the fact that I requested the cancellation within an hour or submitting the order. I advised the company that I would have to do a chargeback with my bank as the service was not provided when required and I was sent the following:- "well, there is nothing else we can do for you. Now, you just need to be aware that if you do a chargeback, then you'll be banned from ordering again and normal measures to recover the payment will be taken." This company are not to be trusted and should be avoided.

name: Terry Chew
review_body: i just asked them for a BACKUPPPP FOR MY SERVER and the answer was we dont offer SUPPORT !!!

name: Anon
review_body: The servers aren't that bad, But the customer service is absolutely horrid. Do NOT buy from them.

name: Daniel
review_body: Great host if you can manage your servers with no support. Thats why their prices are so low. Uptime and stability is no issue for me. Reccomended if you want a cheap, stable server for development and learning!

name: Noorul Ahmed
review_body: I wish I could rate less than one. Complete non-existent support, I ordered servers online and I had to send my address and ID proof but no one responded and when I call their support, only a dull sounding recording voice and it gets disconnected. Save yourself headaches and go to another hosting provider before it is too late. Thanks, Noorul

name: Zosia Nieludzka
review_body: In my experience OVH is terrible, useless customer support who won't help you anyhow, you have to wait 2-3 days for the answer and then you realize that you got automated message which doesn't relate to your problem at all. Comparing it with other providers OVH is the worst service we've ever had.

name: Sven de Vries
review_header: Terrible customer service and slow servers
review_body: Had rented a VPS which turned out to be extremely slow. Called their customer support and was told that since my contract was running out there wasn't anything they could do but I could just re-new my contract so they could fix the issue. Unfortunately I was dumb enough to buy their bullshit and indeed re-new the contract, open a ticket and having to wait approximately 2 days for each reply that contains of a single sentence which is not relevant to my question. Eventually I just told them to close the ticket as they weren't supporting me at all as I was asking WHERE and HOW I could find certain information they required, not WHAT it is. Spare yourself the trouble and look elsewhere.

name: Phil Sars
review_body: Well i got my dedi server from them i chose kimsufi I host gaming servers and have done for years I installed everything and got it up and running , then noticed on connection to my server that pings/latency was high I was surprised because this server is in the exact same location as my last VPS after 3 weeks of tickets getting closed prematurely with no answers to my problem then my server is offline ??? Next day its been wiped , no reason given , no apology so i think ok ill reinstall anyway after weeks the server still laggs and the support on OVH is the final nail in the coffin You must ask on a forum not a ticket , and the forum is full of idiotd trolls etc the admins dont care if you call OVH bad they will close your thread and allow trolls to derail it and abuse you I am now hosting from home PC and to my amazement people who live closer to the dedi server get better pins on my home PC Oh and they will lie to you take a look on there forums if you dont believe me

name: Proof
review_body: Good bandwidth, clear invoices & Support inline with contracts. I had 2 Kimsufi (very low price, correct support) and now a Private cloud (more bandwidth than expected, very good support, fast response time). I also have many domain names hosted by OVH. Service exceed contractual expectation, with reasonible prices. Highly recommanded.
